snippet: Australian Open organizers say they will offer 50 million Australian dollars ($36.2 million) in prize money for the 2017 tennis tournament, including $A3.7 million ($2.68 million) each to the men's and women's singles champions....
lead_paragraph: Australian Open organizers say they will offer 50 million Australian dollars ($36.2 million) in prize money for the 2017 tennis tournament, including $A3.7 million ($2.68 million) each to the men's and women's singles champions.

headline.main: Australian Open Increases Overall Purse to $36.2 Million
headline.print_headline: Australian Open Increases Overall Purse to $36.2 Million
